sentences.chinese: 意思是“请你做某事好吗？”

sentences.english: If he is interested in something, he may use his palm to prop the head.
sentences.chinese: 如果对某事感兴趣，就会用手掌支住头部。

sentences.english: You still love to be praised when you’ve done well.
sentences.chinese: 当你干好某事后你仍然想被表扬。

sentences.english: but rather when you're telling somebody that they should or should not do something.
sentences.chinese: 而是用于告诉某人他们应该做或者不应该做某事。

sentences.english: In order to communicate better about fear or not liking something.
sentences.chinese: 这样你就可以更好地表达恐惧或者对某事的厌恶了。

sentences.english: It takes some time for sb. to do sth.
sentences.chinese: 对某人来说要花一段时间去干某事。

sentences.english: It is the power to do something for someone.
sentences.chinese: 它是为某人做某事的权力。

sentences.english: You want to tell the receiver something, either a compliment or information.
sentences.chinese: 你想要告诉收件人某事，无论是问侯或者是信息。

sentences.english: Of course there are many ways to ask somebody to do something.
sentences.chinese: 当然请求他人做某事的方式有很多。

sentences.english: It costs sb. some money to do sth.
sentences.chinese: 意为“某人花了多少钱做某事”。

sentences.english: Make it adj. for sb. to do sth.
sentences.chinese: 使得做某事对某人来说是怎么样的。

sentences.english: If you’re passionate about something, you’ll feel energized.
sentences.chinese: 如果你对某事很有激情，你会觉得精神饱满。

sentences.english: Or like I said, you can directly reference what you do not wish to do.
sentences.chinese: 或者像我说的那样，你可以直接表态你不想做某事。

sentences.english: If something baffles you, you cannot understand or explain it at all.
sentences.chinese: 如果某事困惑你，你不能明白或者为它作出解释。

sentences.english: And you want to use it when you really, really do not like something
sentences.chinese: 当你特别特别厌恶某事的时候，你才会用这个词。

definition: someone/a certain person/some people/I (self-address after one's surname)
